meanings.sent1: The swamp was oozier after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent2: The mud became oozier as we stepped deeper into the marsh.
meanings.sent3: The oozier ground made it difficult to walk without getting stuck.
meanings.sent4: The oozier terrain seemed to swallow everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The oozier mud clung to our boots, making each step a challenge.

meanings.sent1: The pudding was oozier than expected, almost like a thick syrup.
meanings.sent2: The slime felt oozier between my fingers than I had anticipated.
meanings.sent3: The oozier texture of the slime made it oddly satisfying to play with.
meanings.sent4: The oozier substance flowed slowly, resembling a sluggish river.
meanings.sent5: The oozier consistency of the mud made it hard to clean off our shoes.

meanings.sent1: As the temperature rose, the chocolate sauce became oozier on the dessert.
meanings.sent2: The melted cheese grew oozier as it sat under the heat lamp.
meanings.sent3: The oozier sauce dripped down the side of the plate, creating a messy but tasty display.
meanings.sent4: The oozier lava flowed slowly down the volcano's slopes, a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The oozier consistency of the slime increased as it sat out in the sun.
